description: The golf dinner that led to recriminations, resignations and the recall of the Irish parliament.
title: Q&A: What is GolfGate and why is it causing Ireland problems?
title_page: Q&A: What is GolfGate and why is it causing Ireland problems? - BBC News
maintext: While it did not say this was explicitly down to the controversy around the event, opposition parties have said the action is necessary to bolster confidence in the government response to the coronavirus pandemic.
